text: Barberino Val d'Elsa was a comune in the Metropolitan City of Florence in the Italian region of Tuscany. On 1 January 2019, the former municipalities of Barberino Val d'Elsa and Tavarnelle Val di Pesa merged to form the new municipality of Barberino Tavarnelle. Category:Former municipalities of the Metropolitan City of Florence
title: Barberino Val d'Elsa
